DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether functional electrical stimulation effective treatment dysphagia due nasopharyngeal cancer post radiotherapy
DOC.brief_title: Functional Electrical Stimulation Irradiated Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma ( NPC )
DOC.detailed_description: Nasopharyngeal carcinoma ( NPC ) patient usually underwent radiotherapy ( RT ) chemoradiotherapy ( CRT ) . There complication cause RT , like dysphagia . In recent study , functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) use neurologically dysphagia patient , positive effect study . Hence , decide apply FES NPC patient dysphagia .
DOC.criteria: Primary nasopharyngeal carcinoma Post radiation therapy Mild severe dysphagia Never underwent swallow therapy Recurrent cancer Neurological degenerate disease Total partial laryngectomy Epilepsy With cardiac pacemaker
